textAfterTable: 14 Items Biography Born: 10 February 1939 in Asheville, NC Genre: R&B/Soul Years Active: '60s, '70s, '80s, '90s, '00s, '10s Classy, urbane, reserved, smooth, and sophisticated — all of these terms have been used to describe the music of Roberta Flack, particularly her string of romantic, light jazz ballad hits in the 1970s, which continue to enjoy popularity on MOR-oriented adult contemporary stations.
